content:
How can you compress the text of a news article to half of its original length while preserving its meaning? 
As an example, consider the following news article:
"The year 2020 has been difficult for many people; the global pandemic has drastically changed the way we live our lives, with people in many countries having to stay at home and follow social distancing rules."
Please provide a compressed version of this article while preserving the key information. The compressed version should be in JSON data format and have the following structure:
{
   "title": "The Impact of the 2020 Global Pandemic",
   "body": "The pandemic has drastically altered our way of life. Many countries have enforced strict social distancing rules, forcing people to stay at home. This has been a challenging time for everyone."
}
Note that the compressed version should be half the length of the original article, while still conveying the key information.

To compress the given news article while preserving its key information, we'll focus on maintaining the core message and essential details. Here's the compressed version in the specified JSON format:

```json
{
   "title": "The Impact of the 2020 Global Pandemic",
   "body": "2020 has been challenging due to the pandemic, which altered life globally. Many countries enforced social distancing, requiring people to stay home."
}
```

This compressed version captures the essence of the original article, highlighting the key aspects of the pandemic's impact on daily life and the measures taken by countries while reducing the length to approximately half.
